tool_description: Analyzes multi-period financial trends to identify patterns, trajectories, and potential future performance indicators.

financial_periods.description: Array of financial periods in chronological order

metrics_data.description: Financial metrics data for each period

trend_window.description: Number of periods for trend calculation (3-10)

seasonality_adjustment.description: Apply seasonality adjustment to quarterly data

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: Provide at least 3 periods of financial data for trend analysis.
Mismatched data arrays: Number of periods must match the number of metrics data points per metric.
Invalid trend window: Trend window must be between 3 and 10 periods and not exceed available data.
Data quality issues: Some periods have missing or inconsistent financial data.
Extreme value detection: Some values appear to be outliers that may distort trend analysis.
usage: Provide financial_periods and metrics_data arrays in chronological order. Optionally set trend_window and seasonality_adjustment. Returns trend analysis with direction, stability, and projections.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: IMPROVING, STABLE, DECLINING

trend_strength.description: Strength of trends: STRONG, MODERATE, WEAK

growth_rates.description: Period-over-period growth rates for key metrics

trend_sustainability.description: Trend sustainability outlook: SUSTAINABLE, UNCERTAIN, UNSUSTAINABLE
